typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		company_name as string,
		address as string,
		city as string,
		county as string,
		postal as string,
		phone1 as string,
		phone2 as string,
		email as string,
		web as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		name as string,
		location as string,
		satellites as string[],
		goods as (trade as boolean, customers as string[], orders as (orderId as integer, orderTotal as double, shipped as (orderItems as (itemName as string, itemQty as integer)[]))[])
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments') ~> source2
source1 aggregate(groupBy(first_name),
	counts = count(),
		column1 = count(phone1),
	partitionBy('dynamicRange', 2,
		ERROR_FUNCTION('')
	)) ~> Aggregate1
source1 rank(asc(first_name, true),
	output(rank as long)) ~> Rank1
Aggregate1 foldDown(unroll(),
	mapColumn(
		first_name,
		counts,
		column1
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
source2 foldDown(unroll(satellites),
	mapColumn(
		satellites = satellites,
		name,
		goods = goods
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten2
Flatten2 foldDown(unroll(goods.customers),
	mapColumn(
		trade = goods.trade,
		customers = goods.customers,
		orders = goods.orders,
		satellites,
		name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten3
Flatten3 foldDown(unroll(orders),
	mapColumn(
		orderId = orders.orderId,
		orderTotal = orders.orderTotal,
		shipped = orders.shipped,
		trade,
		name,
		satellites,
		customer = customers
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten4
source1, source2 lookup(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Rank1 lookup(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup2
Flatten1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
